001package edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.controller;
002
003import android.content.SharedPreferences;
004import android.os.Bundle;
005import android.util.Log;
006import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
007import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider;
008import androidx.preference.EditTextPreference;
009import androidx.preference.PreferenceFragmentCompat;
010import androidx.preference.PreferenceManager;
011import edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.R;
012import edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.viewmodel.ApodViewModel;
013import java.time.LocalDate;
014import java.time.format.DateTimeParseException;
015
016public class SettingsFragment extends PreferenceFragmentCompat {
017
018  private static final String TAG = SettingsFragment.class.getSimpleName();
019  private SharedPreferences.OnSharedPreferenceChangeListener listener;
020
021  @Override
022  public void onCreatePreferences(@Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState, String rootKey) {
023    setPreferencesFromResource(R.xml.preferences, rootKey); // Load preferences dynamically
024    setupDobPreference();
025  }
026
027  @Override
028  public void onResume() {
029    super.onResume();
030    SharedPreferences preferences = PreferenceManager.getDefaultSharedPreferences(requireContext());
031    listener = (sharedPreferences, key) -> {
032      switch (key) {
033        case "dark_mode":
034          boolean isDarkMode = sharedPreferences.getBoolean(key, false);
035          applyTheme(isDarkMode);
036          break;
037        case "notifications":
038          // Future notification handling here
039          break;
040        case "dob":
041          String dob = sharedPreferences.getString(key, "");
042          if (dob != null && isValidDate(dob)) {
043            fetchPersonalizedApods(dob);
044          } else {
045            Log.w(TAG, "Invalid date format for DOB: " + dob);
046          }
047          break;
048      }
049    };
050    preferences.registerOnSharedPreferenceChangeListener(listener);
051  }
052
053  @Override
054  public void onPause() {
055    super.onPause();
056    SharedPreferences preferences = PreferenceManager.getDefaultSharedPreferences(requireContext());
057    preferences.unregisterOnSharedPreferenceChangeListener(listener);
058  }
059
060  private void setupDobPreference() {
061    EditTextPreference dobPreference = findPreference("dob");
062    if (dobPreference != null) {
063      dobPreference.setOnBindEditTextListener(editText ->
064          editText.setHint("YYYY-MM-DD")); // Set placeholder for correct format
065    }
066  }
067
068  private boolean isValidDate(String dob) {
069    try {
070      LocalDate.parse(dob); // Validate if the input matches the ISO-8601 date format
071      return true;
072    } catch (DateTimeParseException e) {
073      return false;
074    }
075  }
076
077  private void applyTheme(boolean isDarkMode) {
078    int themeId = isDarkMode ? R.style.AppTheme_Dark : R.style.AppTheme_Light;
079    requireActivity().setTheme(themeId);
080    requireActivity().recreate(); // TODO: Replace activity recreation with selective UI updates
081  }
082
083  private void fetchPersonalizedApods(String dob) {
084    ApodViewModel viewModel = new ViewModelProvider(requireActivity()).get(ApodViewModel.class);
085    viewModel.fetchApodsForDateAcrossYears(dob); // Fetch personalized APODs for the given DOB
086  }
087
088}
